testcase.name: ErrorBoundary > should render children when no error occurs
ErrorBoundary > should render error UI when child throws error
ErrorBoundary > should call console.error when error occurs
ErrorBoundary > should reset error state when reset button is clicked
ErrorBoundary > should have reload button in error UI
Custom Fallback Component > should render custom fallback when provided
Custom Fallback Component > should call custom reset function
Error Callback > should call onError callback when provided
Error Callback > should not call onError when no error occurs
Error Types > should handle different error types
Error Types > should handle errors with empty messages
Error Types > should handle null/undefined errors gracefully

testcase.name: Environment-based Error Details > should display error details in development mode
Environment-based Error Details > should not display error details in production mode
withErrorBoundary HOC > should wrap component with error boundary
withErrorBoundary HOC > should handle errors in wrapped component
withErrorBoundary HOC > should accept custom error boundary props
withErrorBoundary HOC > should pass props to wrapped component
withErrorBoundary HOC > should set correct displayName
Accessibility > should have proper ARIA attributes
Accessibility > should be keyboard accessible
Edge Cases > should handle errors in nested components
